item.title: 食品和运输成本下降，南非通胀放缓
item.description: 南非的通胀率在 6 月份略有放缓，触及 6 个月来的最低点，这有可能促使央行考虑在今年晚些时候降息。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate slowed slightly in June, touching a six-month low and potentially encouraging the central bank to consider cutting interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 德国经济意外下滑，欧元区经济活动陷入停滞
item.description: 由于欧元区第一大经济体意外下滑，本月欧元区私营部门活动几乎没有增长。【原文：Euro-area private-sector activity barely grew this month as its top economy unexpectedly slumped.】

item.title: 瑞典 Alecta 公司亏损 32 亿美元后可能面临制裁
item.description: 瑞典养老基金卷入了去年的美国银行业危机，面临着因投资失误导致 32 亿美元损失和减记而可能受到制裁的风险。【原文：The Swedish pension fund embroiled in last year’s US banking crisis runs the risk of possible sanctions over the investment missteps that led to $3.2 billion in losses and writedowns.】

item.title: 尼泊尔十八个月来最严重车祸造成至少 15 人死亡
item.description: 据当地警方称，Saurya 航空公司的一架航班在尼泊尔加德满都机场起飞时坠毁，造成 15 人死亡。【原文：A Saurya Airlines flight crashed during takeoff from Kathmandu Airport in Nepal, killing 15 people, according to local police.】

item.title: 德国工厂推动私营部门意外下滑
item.description: 由于德国制造业萎靡不振的状况进一步恶化，德国私营部门在 7 月份意外萎缩；这破坏了下半年经济增长回升的希望。【原文：Germany’s private sector unexpectedly contracted in July as country’s manufacturing malaise worsened — undermining hopes that growth will pick up in the second half of the year.】

item.title: 摩根大通称印度需要出售资产支持支出
item.description: 据一位顶级经济学家称，印度政府需要重启资产货币化计划，以创造税收以外的收入来源，这有助于为支出提供资金，同时保持财政稳健。【原文：India’s government needs to revive its asset monetization program to create revenue streams beyond taxes, which can help fund spending while keeping it on a fiscally prudent path, according to a top economist.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在大量财报和大型科技股的冲击下下滑
item.description: 欧洲股市下跌，原因是投资者忙于应对财报，并权衡美国科技巨头业绩的影响。【原文：European stocks declined as investors tackled a rush of earnings and weighed the impact of results from US technology megacaps.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行归还沙特 50 亿美元存款
item.description: 土耳其中央银行周三表示，已与沙特阿拉伯达成协议，终止去年与沙特进行的一笔 50 亿美元的存款交易。【原文：Turkey’s central bank said on Wednesday that it agreed with Saudi Arabia to terminate a $5 billion deposit transaction made with the kingdom last year.】

item.title: 韩国修订《反贪污法》，提高餐费限额
item.description: 韩国反贪局周二表示，韩国将八年来首次提高公职人员的餐费上限，以更好地反映近期的通胀压力。【原文：South Korea will raise the cap on meal expenses for public officials for the first time in eight years to better reflect the recent inflationary pressures, the anti-graft agency said Tuesday.】

item.title: 易捷航空夏季票价保持稳定，预订量持续增长
item.description: 易捷航空（EasyJet Plc）表示，机票价格在关键的暑期期间保持稳定，这与折扣竞争对手瑞安航空（Ryanair Holdings Plc）的前景形成了鲜明对比，后者本周警告称机票价格将明显下降。【原文：EasyJet Plc said airline ticket prices are holding up during the crucial summer period, providing a contrasting outlook to discount rival Ryanair Holdings Plc, which warned this week of a notable decline in airfares.】

item.title: 新质量标准引发销售下滑，中国钢铁市场受到冲击
item.description: 由于新的质量标准迫使贸易商卸载库存，中国钢铁市场面临动荡期，合金价格承压，铁矿石价格走低。【原文：China’s steel market faces a turbulent period as new quality standards force traders to offload stockpiles, pressuring prices of the alloy and driving iron ore lower.】

item.title: 高盛认为中国正积蓄财政火力为应对特朗普做准备
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Donald Trump may already be influencing the economic agenda in China, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 盟国获得预算援助后莫迪面临各国反弹
item.description: 印度反对党控制的各邦抨击印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的政府在今年的预算中向他的两个盟友拨款数十亿美元。【原文：Opposition-controlled states in India slammed Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government after it allocated billions of dollars of funds to two of his allies in this year’s budget.】

item.title: 财报季拉开帷幕，富时 100 指数将遭遇更多损失
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 人头马君度因美国和东南亚市场疲软而销售下滑
item.description: 人头马君度 SA 本财年第一季度销售额下滑，原因是这家干邑生产商受到美国需求下降和东南亚市场疲软的影响。【原文：Remy Cointreau SA sales slumped in the first quarter of its fiscal year as the cognac maker suffered from falling demand in the US and tougher markets in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 调查显示：印度服务业激增，提振经济活动
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，受服务业跃升和制造业回暖的推动，印度7月份的经济活动有所扩张。【原文：India’s economic activity expanded in July, fueled by a jump in services and a pickup in manufacturing, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 德意志银行因遗产纠纷遭遇四年来首次亏损
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）因交易放缓以及与邮政银行（Postbank）零售部门遗留问题有关的费用而出现四年来的首次季度亏损。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG suffered its first quarterly loss in four years as trading slowed and it booked a charge tied to a legacy issue at its Postbank retail unit.】

item.title: 全球套利交易平仓加剧，日元延续升势
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率周三升穿关键水平，导致全球利差交易平仓，推低了从墨西哥比索到澳元和新西兰元等货币的汇率。【原文：The yen rallied through key levels against the greenback on Wednesday, leading an unwind in global carry trades that pushed down currencies ranging from the Mexican peso to the Australian and New Zealand dollars.】

item.title: 随着澳大利亚基金合并的升温，Antipodes 公司将收购枫叶-布朗公司
item.description: Antipodes Partners Ltd. 将收购 Maple-Brown Abbott Ltd.，这是澳大利亚资金管理公司的最新一次合并。【原文：Antipodes Partners Ltd. will acquire Maple-Brown Abbott Ltd. in the latest consolidation of Australian money management firms.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行利润创纪录，超过季度预期
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）在其两个主要市场表现的推动下，第二季度利润超出预期，创下历史新高。该银行还改善了对效率和收入增长的展望。【原文：Banco Santander SA beat expectations to post a record profit in the second quarter, driven by the performance of its two main markets. It also improved its outlook for efficiency and revenue growth.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行利润因股票交易收入激增而上升
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）第二季度利润因股票交易收入激增而上升，推动了首席执行官让-洛朗-邦纳（Jean-Laurent Bonnafe）提高利润率的计划。【原文：BNP Paribas SA’s profit rose in the second quarter on surging equities trading revenue, giving a boost to Chief Executive Officer Jean-Laurent Bonnafe’s plan to raise profitability.】

item.title: 鉴于大跌，券商急忙下调农夫山泉目标股价
item.description: 对农夫山泉销售前景的担忧促使多家经纪公司下调其股票评级，并在股价跌至新低后下调目标价。【原文：Concerns over Nongfu Spring Co.’s sales outlook have prompted a number of brokers to downgrade its stock and slash price targets following a tumble to fresh lows.】

item.title: 泰国顶级医院运营商将根据国外需求扩大医院规模
item.description: 泰国最大的私立医院运营商预计到 2027 年，年收入将增长 10%以上，因为它将增加新床位，以满足国际患者激增的需求。【原文：Thailand’s biggest private hospital operator expects annual revenue to grow more than 10% through 2027 as it adds new beds to meet a jump in demand from international patients.】

item.title: 中国国家队出征，中国股市收跌
item.description: 中国股市基准周三收窄了早盘的跌幅，反弹的同时，众所周知受到国家基金青睐的交易所交易基金的交易活动也出现了跳升。【原文：Chinese equity benchmarks pared early losses Wednesday, with the rebound coinciding with a jump in trading activity among exchange-traded funds known to be favored by the state fund.】

item.title: 巴西禁令危及中国蓬勃发展的鸡爪市场
item.description: 鸡爪在点心店的菜单上无处不在，也是一种很受欢迎的街头小吃，但鸡爪价格的飙升却有可能让许多中国消费者望而却步。【原文：They’re ubiquitous on dim sum restaurant menus, and a popular street food snack, but a surge in chicken feet prices is threatening to put them out of reach of many Chinese consumers.】

item.title: 马来西亚审查倾销法，中国廉价商品引发担忧
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部正在审查其反倾销立法，并计划于明年将其提交给国会，与印尼一道关注中国廉价产品对当地企业造成的伤害。【原文：Malaysia’s Trade Ministry is reviewing its anti-dumping legislation and plans to present it to parliament next year, joining Indonesia in heeding concerns about cheap Chinese products hurting local businesses.】

item.title: 比特币奖励公司 Fold 据称接近与贝特西-科恩 SPAC 达成交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，比特币奖励公司 Fold Inc.【原文：Fold Inc., the Bitcoin reward firm, is in advanced talks to go public via a blank-check company started by SPAC veteran Betsy Cohen, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 债券市场发生叛变，亿万富翁挑起债务战
item.description:

Bruising encounters with European tycoons like Patrick Drahi and Paul Coulson mean many creditors are vowing that they’ll never back such individuals again.
